pr_title: Add config option to control selling names items with /sell

timeline.message: Add config option to allow/block selling items from /sell

timeline.bodyText: sell-named-items or allow-selling-named-items would sound less awkward in my opinion.
timeline.author: pop4959
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -573,6 +573,10 @@ npcs-in-balance-ranking: false
 # This is useful when a sign sells or buys one item at a time and the player wants to sell a bunch at once.
 allow-bulk-buy-sell: true
 
+# Allow selling of items with custom names with the /sell command.
+# This may be useful to prevent players accidentally selling named items.
+allow-sell-named-items: false
